lead_paragraph: The White House said it would not expel diplomats and expressed no indignation about the Russian espionage.
snippet: The White House said it would not expel diplomats and expressed no indignation about the Russian espionage.

headline.main: Despite Arrests, Working to Rebuild Russia Ties
headline.seo: Despite Arrests, Obama Works to Rebuild Ties With Russia
headline.print_headline: Pressing ‘Reset,’ Even if the Computer May Be Hacked
